Name: textile production, jute, weaving | textile, jute | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/13:Manufacture of textiles/131:Spinning, weaving and finishing of textiles/1312:Weaving of textiles
Description: West Bengal is the main centre of jute production in India. Jute is an important natural fibre crop in India next to cotton. Almost all parts of state are producing Jute and processing it.
